website_summaries.verdict: An attractive screen door that is inexpensive and easy to install and use. Definitely worth considering despite a few concerns.
pros: Very easy to install, and has strong magnets that keep it securely closed
Fiberglass material is lightweight yet durable
cons: Some owners gripe that the measurements are a few inches longer than expected
The downside of the light-colored mesh is that is shows dirt easily

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at how good it looks!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised with the quality, look and ease of "installation" on the magnetic screen door. I am female, nearing 70, and had no problem putting it on and tweaking the sides to ensure that there weren't any gaps where the screens meet in the middle. I purchased the white screen to match my new white single french door. This is a personal thing for me, but I wish the magnets were also white instead of black. I was so tempted to try to spray paint them white, through the seam material, but that was temporary moment of Should I, Would I, Could I? NOT!
customer_reviews.author: CBuffalo

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated looks good
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. I bought the white mesh to match the white door. It’s not like a window screen. Cons: It’s thicker and you can’t see much of the patio through it. Also my door is metal and attracts the magnets. The upper area is small so you have to go through it carefully. Pros: the magnets attach great and the installation was a breeze. I used the tacks and it’s set. The glue is strong so I suspect it will peel off the paint from the frame if I remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzymint

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install, and it works perfectly for our needs. We wanted a screen for the front door that would allow fresh air to circulate throughout the house, without paying 400+ for a standard screen. We have an 8ft door that is hard to find a screen for, that is not custom made. This was much cheaper, and the size 38X99 worked. I ordered it on Sunday, and it arrived on Tuesday. I have added photos showing how it looks installed. I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sagg99

customer_reviews.title: This works great! I trimmed the bottom (and plan on reattaching ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not think this was going to work. I have two kids and a large blind dog and my door is 36" x 84". I figured this wouldn't work well, but might get us through until we decided to replace the whole door. I was WRONG. This works great! I trimmed the bottom (and plan on reattaching the bottom edging and magnets, although I haven't yet) to get it to the right length. It closes every time, keeps the bugs out, and the dog doesn't even seem to see that it's there. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like that the magnets are strong and it’s a sturdy material. However chewing animals still get through it so that’s a downfall. Went with the white cause of my frame color, but in hindsight black might have been better to be able to see through.
customer_reviews.author: Shazia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Used for mi sliding door and even though it wasn’t totally perfect fit I was able to tuck it under the siding and put the Velcro on the frame of the sliding door and work perfectly. The magnet close just fine and if they don’t latch when I pass I help it get together but no big deal. I’m glad that I’m able to open the door and don’t be afraid of bugs coming in. It was very important to me to get the white one because I have very little natural light as it is in my apartment and I wasn’t going to block it so white was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these last year and this one is even better. Even easier to install—completely obvious. Cut a length of velcro tape, press it where you want it, attach screen. The screen itself is durable and has haft. I had black last time and wondered about how noticeable white would be. As a matter of fact I considered returning it to get a black one before I even hung it. But it looks nice. And the quality is great. Very happy. Do measure your door. Or rather, don’t make assumptions about how wide or “standard” doors are. Measurements matched the product offerings and it fits great. But I would have chosen wrong if I hadn’t measured.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. I have to say the customer service is very good. Immediately after my review, they approached me to help me fix the problem. They suggested that I put 0.4 inch higher in the center. Since I bought four screens, I set up the one for the basement door (30" wide, black version) the way they suggested. It seemed to be more sturdy than the first one I put on the second floor window (38" wide). They also sent me a replacement so I can try on my other window. Will update again when I have time to put it up. Just hate those flies!!
customer_reviews.author: SHC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It was everything I expected plus more. I live in a apartment and I'm now able to open my patio door for fresh air everyday. For me installation was reachability easy because I followed the included instructions. The screen was white which looks really nice with the door frame and my property manager noticed and complement me on it. The one negative for me was I did not measure the width of the door frame correctly, but I found an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Great value! Doubles as a doggy door!
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a screen/storm door on our back door to our town home, so this item is a game-changer for us. Now we can enjoy a nice crossflow breeze without the bugs. As a bonus.... our dog learned to use is as a doggy door in minutes! My only complaint is that it wasn't offered in a dark color in the size we needed (32x80) so you can see the magnets through the white fabric. Also, it's not weighted on the bottom like others. Overall, very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great screen door !!
customer_reviews.text: This product is 2 inches short in height and I could not find the needed dimension among its selection. Likewise unable to find on other vendors as well. The quality and built of this screen door is excellent! Easy to install. I hammered a few white-colored tacks on to the door frame to ensure the frame will stay in place after prolonged use. It has tabs at the bottom (see photo) and middle of the screen door to prevent accidentally opening eg a sudden strong gust of wind..
customer_reviews.author: A. O.

customer_reviews.title: Number of issues for certain uses
customer_reviews.text: Install into stucco is just not possible with the tacs included. I had to buy better small nails. The adhesive for stucco or the wood is useless. The magnets fell and then the mesh ripped. These lasted about 6-12months. We have 2 double doors, and covered both. One was used more often and that was messed up in less time. So this is not a long term solution at all. I think what happens is that the material weathers and deteriorates on the edges first, and that causes the magnets to fall out. The when they dont stay together straight the mesh gets worn as it flexes and that breaks apart.
customer_reviews.author: AfterhourshopTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: White color looks nicer
customer_reviews.text: I thumbtacked this over my entire window that has an AC unit installed bc it seemed to be a doorway to every bug species on earth. Has blocked a lot of mosquitos and some spiders too. The white color blends in really nice with light colored walls. The magnets work fine and close the thing together fine. Will definitely keep it and hopefully someday use it for a porch instead of a third story studio apartment window. It had a pretty terrible plastic death smell at first but its gone now. Size is correct.
customer_reviews.author: sunparrot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this screen! It is exactly what I needed. The magnets are strong and the screen closes properly every time! The ONLY thing that I would change is the 2 velcro closure tabs. They are both on the OUTSIDE of the screen, so they are not accessible from inside the house. My screen is on my French doors on my deck. Yesterday it was very windy outside, but in order to use these tabs, I would have to go outside, fasten the velcro tabs and then walk around to the front of the house to come back inside. BUMMER! Otherwise, I am very happy with this screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit our french doors very well, functions well
customer_reviews.text: This was going to be a temporary solution but we might just keep it instead of installing expensive retracting screen doors. Our doors were 71 inches wide so this fit perfectly. If your doors are a few inches narrower it should still work but the border will extend out past the opening to make it taut. I got white because I wanted white tape on the edges instead of grey.
customer_reviews.author: SSL

customer_reviews.title: This screen is losing its luster for us.
customer_reviews.text: OK, been purchasing these for years and in the beginning they velco worked, the magnets worked and they lasted a few seasons and the price was great. Now for some reason they seem to have cheapened the product. Its really frustrating as the dogs tear down the velco or run through the screening leaving large holes and the price is double if not triple of the cost before. So tired of products increasing in cost and decreasing in value.........
customer_reviews.author: KA01

customer_reviews.title: I wish I purchased sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen. I put it by myself. Would’ve been nice to have help; but, totally doable. I use it for my French doors. The added bonus is this screen acts as a privacy screen during the day. To see inside, I had to walk up to the screen and put my face really close to see inside. In the evening, I got same the results with the t.v. light. If you turn the lights on then it’s another story. My dogs are a little confused. They seem to find it out hard to get out...but typically can come in with no problem. I have the white screen and white doors. Not a complaint. Just an observation. But it!
customer_reviews.author: shayboogie

customer_reviews.title: So, so.. Not impressed, but it'll do for now.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. Two of the push pin metal tips were bent beyond use. I didn't realize that until I grabbed one of the bent ones from the box and went to put it in. I'll have to go to the hardware store and find something similar that will work. The magnets are not very strong. My 52# dog went through the bottom of the mesh, it didn't stick back together. Left a 3" gap open. For humans, there's enough movement in the entire mesh to click back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, cost effective / quick solution
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Great cost effective way to help you keep out insects. We have a door that we wanted to have open in the evenings but didn't want to spend $200+ on a retractable screen door, so we opted for this. Glad we did! Works great. My only complaint is that the adhesive doesn't work well. It did at first, but now it's coming apart. Given the door frame is not wood, we can't use the tacks, so we had to purchase a different adhesive on our own. but other than that, it works great and it's definitely worth the investment. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunocean18

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a tall condo balcony door.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our very tall balcony door. We've purchased the "as seen on tv" version of this in the past and this one is far sturdier. The other one just felt like we were one mistake away from ripping a hole in the mesh. This is just a bit more heavy duty. It's white mesh, and after the easy installation, looks like it was a custom made item. I would definitely recommend this for you if you want to pop your condo door open for air, but not let the bugs invite themselves in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: A great screen for the back porch
customer_reviews.text: I like having the windows open on a mild or breezy day and this screen is a wonderful fit. It was simple to install, though I used a staple gun for the velcro base instead of just relying on the glue. I think I would have had no problem with giving five stars if the velcro tabs to defeat the wind were on the inside as well as the outside. But, with a little practice it's easy enough to secure the tabs from the inside. And they work well on a day with wind gusts.
customer_reviews.author: cfeagans

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Functional, Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect practical and easy solution! We had a regular screen door that broke (of course) and didn’t want to put too much money in having another screen door, I was a little sceptic at first but this product is super easy to install, it sticks really well to the door frame (I couldn’t use the push pins since the frame is metal and it still feels sturdy enough), our patio door opens outward so I installed it on the inner frame and it looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mica B.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one a year ago (black) worked great. Except screen got a small hole, so I thought just get new one. A little disappointed I purchased white by mistake. My fault I didn't read. But the magnet in middle doesn't close, unless I push together. The black one was awesome. Not very happy with new color or screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Cooersmith

customer_reviews.title: Yellow Lab tested
customer_reviews.text: Our 80lb curious yellow lab likes to go in and out of the back yard often. We've had this screen up for about a month and it has held up very well with our dog in and out and scratching at it when the sliding door was closed. It has greatly decreased the amount of flies entering the house which was the main reason for the purchase. Magnets are closing well with the extensive use. I used a few of the included nails/pins for extra support and there's been no issue with it staying in place. Great purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS- PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: So prior to purchasing, I asked a question about if this will work to keep my cat out of a room that my hamster is in. Alot (most- if not all) of responses advised me against getting it, and said the cat will be able to get in. Since I am a person who need to learn for themselves :) I went ahead and purchased this. It works great! My cat doesnt even go near it or the room. Its blocked off, and thats all he knows. I have had it for about a month. This is perfect and was exactly what I was looking for! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The screen works great and is durable it's just one inch too short for my 80" doorway. I only wanted this so I could keep my door open while remodeling my porch and keep the bugs out. I fixed the gap be adding a temporary two inch piece of wood to the upper doorway frame until I'm done with the porch The magnets work great and my dog has no problem going through it without breaking it. Make it a inch or so longer and it's five stars
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Ready to install, recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works as its intended. The magnets are strong and you don't need to realign the screen to ensure its closed, it does that on its own, like magnetic magic! The screen was easy to install. I definitely suggest using the tacks that come with the screens as this provides an extra hold. This was perfect for the simmer time when I wanted to have my doors open and nor allow any bugs to either crawl or fly in to my house.
customer_reviews.author: ElKraken79

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Dogs can go in and out to the porch, but bugs and leaves stay out! Works perfect. The magnets come together really well after dog or human passes through. Installation was easy and it seemed like it would hold up well, but we put a few staples to it, just to make sure. And we have a metal door, so we had to put a little barrier, to keep the magnet from sticking to it, if it got to close. But no big deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first as I have had many of these types of screens through the years. However this one is different. The obvious is that it’s white. It matches my white door frame. It’s much sturdier than all the others I’ve tried, thicker too! I liked it had tape to adhere all the way around the frame in addition to the tacks. The helpful instructions helped me to get the perfect fit. I am very pleased with this product and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our back door, and it is great. We can leave the back door wide open now for a cross breeze. The magnets are strong and quickly close the 'door'. I did add 3 smaller magnets to the bottom with glue, one on the screen door, and the other on the door frame so it seals up the back door on the bottom as well. It was a tad too large, but it isn't even noticeable and the velcro can easily be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks good and keep the bugs out
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up. It’s wonderful not to have bugs come in when the cats are coming in or out of the house. The cats are rough and climb, chew and scratch the screen. So it’s holding up good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several different types of screens, returned 2 as they would not close all the way so the bugs could still get in. A different name brand, I gave away as it was too lightweight for my dogs. I have purchased 2 screens by this company, a black one and a white one and both work great and auto close up after the dogs come in and out. I have purchased higher cost ones but these are by far the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bo Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic screen door was extremely easy to install (I installed in less than 30 minutes with a step tool). I am giving it an overall 4.5 star...I am not sure if the velcro adhesive will hold when the temperature is 100 degrees outside. Also, wish there can be more lengths to choose from. My door measuers 33x93...this item measures 36x96. I installed it on the outer rim of the door frame and it fits perfectly horizontally by folding the corners. The length is just way too long... but that's ok too because my balcony door happens to be 6 inches above the the balcony floor. Will come back to update rating if adhesion holds up in hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Ochen

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the bugs out!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and it’s amazing! It’s very easy to set up, great quality, and doesn’t look tacky. It’s easy to walk through & the magnets are super strong and close immediately after you walk through. My neighbor even noticed and asked where we got it so they can get one! Yay, now we can enjoy the open door without letting the flies in!
customer_reviews.author: Audish

customer_reviews.title: White is the way to go - Doesn't look stupid - Easy to Install - Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I like how sleek this thing looks, while also being durable. Our door trim is white so having a white screen is great. It also keeps the house bright and not put a shadow on things. It was easy to install, fits perfectly. If you line it up just right for your door, the magnets are perfectly flush to make it look really nice. We got this to use for leaving the door open for the dogs and they understood how it works instantly. Easy to clean too since the dogs make the bottom dirty. Keeps the bugs out! We'll see how it hold up over the next season. Wish I would have ordered this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for my french doors
customer_reviews.text: I live in the country and have french doors to my deck that allow a good breeze, but the bugs are terrible. This was a great solution. My 8 lb Shih Tzu has figured out how to come in and out through the flap and the magnets close it right back up. I've not yet used the adhesive on my frame because I temporarily tacked it up (one in each corner, one in the top middle and an extra in the center on each side) with the provided thumb tacks to see if I'd like this as a solution. It holds so well, that I've not removed them.
customer_reviews.author: WH7126

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple months ago so our dogs can go in and out on their own. The magnets are great and it stays shut unless one corner gets hung up on the door. I also like it when I can carrying things out to the deck I don’t have to fumble with a door. Make sure when you are hanging it you allow it to graze the ground and don’t make it too tight on the sides or magnets won’t close all the way and you have a gap. It’s easier to hang with two people.
customer_reviews.author: jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Well made difficult measurements
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use this item and had to return it because it did not fit. I measured several times using the Instructions provided on the website and really looked forward to using it, but it was to long and to narrow to hang. I would have reordered it but felt i would not get one that worked with my doorway. It would be nice if they gave customizing options of the product and alternatives to the way to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Rahn

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase! The quality of this is light years ahead of other brands, including that "as seen on tv" one. The magnets line up very nicely and are weighted just right to keep the screen hanging smoothly. This design is also durable enough to withstand my dog going in and out constantly. As far as the white color goes, I think it's great! When our patio door is closed, the screen is hardly even noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for pollen sufferers and "in & out" dogs dogs
customer_reviews.text: Just installed. Very easy to put up. Did it as a one person job and fairly quickly. The "velcro" strip adheres very well to the wall comment but I was still able to adjust it without taking any paint off the wall. It also comes with back-up push pins for added security, but I didn't need it at this time. Great product. The only one I've seen in an extra large size and in white. Blends very well with our door frame.
customer_reviews.author: Shop_fran

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get!
customer_reviews.text: I can't attest to the durability myself, BUT this was actually shared with me by a friend who has had hers for over a year and loves it. Mine just arrived. Very easy installation. I had a different one in the past and it was out the door quickly because it didn't shut well at the magnets allowing too many critters still inside. This one closes extremely well! Do yourself a favor. Pay very close attention to how to measure as it will make a difference. Get it right the first time and you will be extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because the double patio doors open out, and needed something to keep the flies out when the doors were open, so the dogs could go in and out. Used it last fall (Oct-Dec), then stored until March, and has been up since spring. Numerous rips in it. This morning dogs paw got stuck in one of the lower rips that then ripped the screen from the trim on top. These should last more than 10 months. If you just need a screen up and no one going in and out they will last. But if you have dogs or people coming in and out...don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the sliding glass door!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something the cats could use to go in and out of then swing shut on its own. For the price, this was the perfect solution! I've been using it for a few months now and it's held up great! It was easy to install and the magnets work as advertised. My only complaint is, if you put it up according to instructions, the velcro closures are on the outside, which doesn't make any sense. It would be a lot more useful if there was a set on the inside to keep them closed when you are in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Only one that fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you want! It is the only one that actually fits my 96x96 door. I have a 50lb dog that plows through it like it’s a game and it’s very durable. I still treat them as disposable. It lasts a full season even with the abuse and is way cheaper than replacing the sliding screen yearly. Only downfall is that of you aren’t paying attention it may not close completely and bugs will get in.
customer_reviews.author: AZJoe

customer_reviews.title: Easy and seamless!
customer_reviews.text: Must have before the summer mosquitoes come! Easy to install. Comes with little tacks to give you better security. Even if dimensions are a little off, it’s easy to adjust and fold a corner to fit. Matches our white French doors perfectly without feeling bulky or cheap. (Currently training our cat to push through and he seems to be getting the hang of it too!)
customer_reviews.author: Sara M

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!  Installs in minutes.
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to install and works great. It takes about 10 minutes to put up and is super sturdy. I have Great Danes so it had to be. I bought one of the roll-up screen doors from somewhere else and it only lasted 2 days before one of the Danes ran through it. This screen is a lot better option. The magnets hold the two pieces together super well also.
customer_reviews.author: cheern4u

customer_reviews.title: The best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: I use these because I have two dogs that are active and I love to leave the door open to the back yard. I go through two or three of these a year. THIS one looks very sturdy and hasn't broken after one day of use. It is stitched and much sturdier than any of the others I've ordered. I'll update if it turns out to be weak, but I'm very impressed after day one.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the product. I installed on the inside of French doors that swing out. I didn’t even use the tacks yet and the adhesive on the Velcro has not had any issues after a month. It seems like it is best to always walk through the middle of the opening to ensure that it closes properly. Since it’s installed inside, I expect it to last well.
customer_reviews.author: orsont

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking at these for years and was afraid it would be a waste of cash. Bought one in early summer and installed on the basement door which has no space for a door that swings open. Super Easy to install, great workmanship and quality. I bought two more after a couple of weeks for the main floor front and back doors. In early October I took the 'doors' off the velcro loop tape for winter cleaning cleaning and storage. It was great finally being able to leave the basement door open and the grandkids loved walking right through them with no hands:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find the exact size for our balcony windows (42 in x 80 in) but found this as the closest one that covers our size. It doesn't fit perfectly, of course, but we love it soooo much and felt lucky to find white color. It's easy to install and came as it is advertised. Our wall (something like plaster board) wasn't good for adhesive tapes so we taped the wall then put adhesive sticker came just to make sure!
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Measurement incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for our back door. I like the sturdiness of product, but the measurement fell short and not as described by seller. Had to reposition the item below the door frame to reduce the gap at bottom of door. Not sure how effective this will hold up after removing and repositioning the product couple of times top close the gap, have to give it time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly amazing. Very easy to install. It actually opens and closes like magic. Perfect fit for our double door. Don’t even need a hand to open. Simply walk in and out and it shuts behind you. We about to get another one for downstairs. Highly recommend. It’s just about half an inch shorter so we adjusted the welcrow on both sides so magnets touch each other.
customer_reviews.author: H P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, strong adhesive, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I had worked with some other magnetic screens, this one is by far superior! It actually stuck to the wood frame, and then I had to move it b/c of the way my door open and the adhesive was strong enough to stick to the wall. Although, you'll want to make sure you do your best to install it right the first time b/c the adhesive may tear away some paint/stain. The instructions were easy to follow, much better than some other screen sets. It does mention that it may not stick as well to concrete and some other materials. For your info. Provided some extra pushpins if you wanted to help ensure its hanging ability.
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: Fits n works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, I am using this screen door in one of my 2 Lake Cabins I built a wall divider between my livingroom/bedroom n Kitchen to keep dog hair from flying in the kitchen area. This worked perfect had no problems the magnets are great. Thanks. Highly recommend. I can see through this clearly. Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gomez

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!  It’s a breeze to install.
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen. One of my best purchases. It’s so easy to install that my 16-yr-old put it up in no time. The screen allows us to keep our deck door open and get the nice breeze from the deck without having to worry about the bugs coming in. When we have guests over, we no longer have to keep reminding them to close the door to avoid flies/insects from flying in. I bought the white screen. I wished I had gotten the black one because the white screen makes it harder to enjoy the view outside. Black screen seems to blend in with the background more.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Tioanda

customer_reviews.title: Finally Fresh Air Without Pesky Flies!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality, easy to install, and the description is spot on. The velcro strip is so good that he didn't even use the thumb racks. Our dog goes in and out multiple times a day and it still remains in place. Our 79-year old neighbor even put hers up before we could go and put up for her. So nice to have the patio door open without unwanted flies and bees buzzing around the house. The white keeps the house bright inside too. We both love our screens!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Not the cheapie one. This one has a working magnetic door close system. The magnets are integrated into the door and not hard plastic boxes like cheaper models.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fully close
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three different brands of these mesh curtains because it's so hard to tell them all apart from the descriptions and reviews and I have three doors that need curtains. This was the only one that didn't fully close - we tried and tried but that one section seemed like the magnets didn't work at all (hanging the center higher than the ends didn't make a difference). Otherwise it looked nice and adhered well, seemed promising!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy white you will regret it, but is great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the durability of the screens and they are great at keeping bugs out. My only regret is i got the white ones and they are hard to see thru makes everything look smoky and they show dirt. I also bought one for my garage door and it is black, love it. If you want a better view get the black ones.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and has a very clean look to it. Perfect to let air in and block sun. The only thing that could be improved on is to have a row of magnets along the bottom to lay flat across the bottom of door jamb so to not have any gaps for bugs to get it. The magnets could be just like what is along the middle opening. Outside of that I love it!! I will be looking for magnets strips to incorporate to the bottom and add a metal strip along bottom to adhere to but pull away easily. Hopefully I can find something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Swingle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: We come and go a lot through a patio door that has 2 sliding screen doors. We replaced the sliding panels with this screen; and what an improvement to this high traffic area. It is not as transparent (easy to see through) as the previous sliding panels, but the screen is a heavier material to stand up to the use it gets. I’ve gotten use to the difference in clarity.
customer_reviews.author: David Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected with strong magnets and the sizing was correct. Keeps out the mosquitoes for sure!! Our dog loves going out the back doors whenever she wants and we love the breeze. Only complaint was it's white, so not always totally see through, but whatever. I like how it looks on the house.
customer_reviews.author: Careena

customer_reviews.title: If you have dogs inside and bugs outside, you need this screen!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is perfect for letting your dogs out while keeping most of the bugs outside...better than a screen door since opening a screen door would let a bunch of bugs in. A couple of bugs will get in from time to time, but nothing compared to what would get in without it! A+ recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Watt

customer_reviews.title: EASY and beautiful addition to my patio doors!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the easy install. One thing that was confusing was that my instructions said to lay flat with the tap facing up; however, when I did this it wasn't the side that I needed to attach the Velcro. After watching the y-tube video, I installed the Velcro on the opposite side and it works; however, my closure tab is on the outside not on the inside...hum.
customer_reviews.author: LD Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We couldn’t be happier. I have a double slider and we weren’t sure this was going to work. It fits like a dream and gives me peace of mind. We have an 80 lb dog and once he got used to pushing through, all our problems were solved. No more up and down to let the dog in and out and the bugs stay outside where they belong.
customer_reviews.author: Eye girl

customer_reviews.title: super easy to install but does not close as it should or like in the videos
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install and fit the opening perfectly - however there are two different types of magnets in the two edges that are supposed to stick together - there are some small ones which are powerful and stick easily together then there are some long ones that were pretty much bent from the whole thing being folded up for shipping - those magnets will not bend back straight and barely stick together so this leaves quite a few openings as seen in the photos - would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: clolarte

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for indoor/outdoor party
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for our 4th of July party. We were expecting a large turnout with and the opening and closing of our slider door onto the deck with that many people was a recipe for something breaking. In addition, we had issues with everyone going in and out and flies getting into the house. This product exceeded my expectations with keeping bugs out. It was so easy to install and it stayed intact even with the constant in and out through the opening. This product is extremely sturdy and the opening went back together after someone walked through extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: xtina

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Our home has no screen on the double doors. We decided to try this mesh as an inexpensive temporary option allowing us to leave the doors open. It works well and has surprised us with its ease of installation and the almost magical way the magnets draw the screen back together.
customer_reviews.author: rickeh

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Flies Out Great
customer_reviews.text: Ever since installled this over door, we keep door open, so cats can go in and out as they please. Works great. No more flies coming into the house while allow for air flow. This came in longer size than expected. So we used a scissors and cut off the bottom part. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: feline_graduate_studentTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Breeze in. Insects out.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third MAGZO Magnet Screen. All the doors in my house have this brand of screens. Easy to install and to stow away for the winter these screens are efficient in keeping flying insects out of your house, while giving easy access in and out and let the breeze in in the morning and evening.
customer_reviews.author: enriver

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! I love my door open but don’t want flys, this is my favorite thing ever!! I had to use thumb tacks every 12 inches or so, to keep the adhesive strip secure to the outer wall. Other than that it’s great!! I use to have a black one and I will go back to black next time. Through the Black- was easy to see the backyard. The white is hard to see, I have to actually open it to see anything.
customer_reviews.author: leanna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiest screen yet
customer_reviews.text: Every year I have to buy a new screen. This one seems the sturdiest. The Velcro and glue strip are wider and very sturdy. I think I might be able to keep this one for a few years, time will tell. It also gives you a little more material, so you don't have to stretch it to make it fit. I found this to be a problem with other screens.
customer_reviews.author: Leeanne Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had been a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: Ok this,in theory, was a great idea for our French double doors. We needed a little bit bigger for our doors. Measurements were spot on buuut it needed a little more slack to work properly. We also had to staple the outside up instead of just the sticky/Velcro for it to stay. Otherwise great! The netting is sturdy and product is well made material.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and very easy to use it. I gave only 4 stars for durability because we bought it this summer; it did well during the hot summer days, still waiting to see how it will behave during cold freezing winter days. So far I will buy it again! It does a great job for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Good strong stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! But just from the previous reviews regarding the Velcro I went ahead n ordered heavier duty stuff. But the mesh itself and from size to quality it is perfect and super strong stuff. Literally no complaints!! A must buy... everyone needs to throw away ur sliding screen door n replace with this cause it saves so much time keeps the bugs out and hands free best part. I have 4 kids n they go in and out our back door all day so this is perfect it closes itself.
customer_reviews.author: Khou Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy as pie to install
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy I could install it in 5 minutes. It's perfect because it allows my puppy to go in and out of the house without me constantly opening the door to let her out. As the guard dog, it's important to be able to perform your job...and it was made easier with this screen.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks and fits great even though our doorway is old and crooked. The small nails included are great for extra support. Have been using it frequently for the last month or two and no issues. Easy for my dog and cat to use. Magnets always close immediately behind you. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: The price is amazing ($32.99 at the time of purchase) and the directions were simple to follow. I ended up just using the adhesive and skipping the tacks, but I love that I don’t have to worry about flies coming in anymore! Simple and effective, plus I love that it came in white!
customer_reviews.author: Mama T

customer_reviews.title: Good economical solution for doggie door.
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen material. It's sturdy for paws of 24 lb dog. Don't know how it might fare with stronger paws. Works well. The magnets are strong and do close the screen well. Make sure to buy the correct length size, not too long or you'll have problems with the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Doggie door replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Hesitant to buy but am very pleased! We have a full glass, 8’ patio door which didn’t allow us to install a doggie door. This solved the issue. We trained our dog to go in and out on her own! The magnets are strong enough to withstand a high wind but come apart easily when pushed. I am also happy with how easy it is to install and take down if necessary. Comes with tacks to hold in place but we didn’t use them and it’s still very strong.
customer_reviews.author: d Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen door. It’s down now for the winter, washed up nicely and it will go up easy; I left the Velcro up in the doorway. It will look brand new next Spring.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed
customer_reviews.text: This screen pass through is pretty great. It was easy to install and is very substantial. The magnets are strong and pull the panels together well and quickly every time. I’ve bought these kinds of door screens before and the material was thinner and just didn’t look neat and nice, and the magnets were weak leaving the panels always hanging open. This one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I’m genuinely surprised at how good of quality this screen is and how good it actually looks. It’s the perfect size based on my measurements and looks very understated. You wouldn’t notice it unless you were looking directly at it. The magnetic closures come together perfectly from top to bottom. I just installed it so I can’t speak to the longevity but even if it only lasts one summer, it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Extra details
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen ! The 5 starts comes from the durability, magnet strength and of all things they have 2 Velcro snaps for when it gets really windy out it will stop the magnets from separating and the magnets slamming against the sliding glass door, any mom of kids that nap you will be very happy!!! 5 stars all the way !
customer_reviews.author: KittyCat

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market
customer_reviews.text: i have purchased many of these types of screens as i have 4 dogs. EVERYTHING about this product is excellent and by far the best i have seen. I love the white mesh as it looks clean and is easy to see through. The magnets work perfectly...fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.author: charles bush

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I love love love this one! I wish I know this product 5 years ago. Problems solved. I can see the view clear yet I can prevent bugs to come inside. Easy to install. I’m 5’3” and I was able to easily install on 8’ high sliding doors!! Thank you so so much!
customer_reviews.author: KMar

customer_reviews.title: Works good, white was not a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to install. Magnetic attachment is strong. The extra Velcro latch does look a bit odd. Being white became dirty at the connect very quickly (it is used by three dogs).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price i was pleasantly surprised at how nice this looked once installed, which only tool about 20 mins. The magnet closures work great and being able to open the door without worrying about bugs coming to let fresh air in is everything.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Stillman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, easy to install. The only one not to like it is the cat, she sees it as a wall that keeps her from going into the patio. I am glad I read reviews , and ordered the white version. I was afraid of how it would look from the inside , and I do not really notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Delon Winburn

customer_reviews.title: Screen mesh is white and not black.  It looks cloudy
customer_reviews.text: I had the black one before buying the white. I wanted one that matched my door frame so I decided to try this. The screen itself is white and I can no longer see through it. It just looks fuzzy and cloudy whereas with the black mesh you can see who is at your door easily.
customer_reviews.author: Father of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: It works well when the breeze is moderate. Magnets don't hold screen together if breeze is a little stronger. Installation requires help if it's a double door. Be careful with the tape as once it sticks it pulls the paint from the wooden frame. Grateful for some fresh air relief it gives.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good find !
customer_reviews.text: Keeps bugs out so you can get fresh air, leaving the door open ... and the dog can come and go as he pleases to lay on the deck! About 1/2 inch too short but still happy with the product. Love the white to match the door frame. Good find!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Best screen ever
customer_reviews.text: We have lived in this home for 18 years. This screen is the fourth or fifth we have installed. This was the easiest to install and the best made. The biggest improvement is that magnets run the entire length, not just here and there.
customer_reviews.author: laruso

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Doesn't stick well and the magnets don't close unless i grab the sides and pull them together. Do not recommend. I purchased 3 and they were all terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Magali

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The one star less is for the adhesive, but i used some gorilla double tape to let it firmly stick to the door frame. Problem solved. Overall, the door screen is nice, I prefer the white color. And the nail is also white, which is very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Leo K.

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Magzo screen
customer_reviews.text: This is the second magzo screen I have purchased. Choose white because I didn’t want a strip of black Velcro on my white door trim when not using it and it is a white door so thought the black would look too wierd. I love it but the white screening you see way more than the dark sceeening. Wish they made white edges with the dark screening. That’s my only thin I wish were different.
customer_reviews.author: cindy p.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It worked perfectly on my kitchen door. Magnets closed perfectly and tape is durable. Very easy to assemble! Haven't been placed for a long time but so far holding up. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dra.MHC

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: Life changing! I always get little nats that linger in the house but love having my doors open. These are so great! You can tear them down and put them back up of you want. My dog pushes thru them too and they always close perfectly with those strong magnets. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Susi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install. We have a single French door that leads out to the balcony. We just installed a small water feature and this screen allows us to hear the fountain bubbling and the cool breezes to flow through and keeps the bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Stoutie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Have a door leading to porch that doesn’t have a screen , so I thought I would give this a shot! It’s awesome . Very well made . Not cheap looking .. magnets are very strong .. hangs nicely . now I can leave my door open !! I’m so glad I bought this !
customer_reviews.author: Olympian

product_meta.title: MAGZO Magnet Screen Door 34 x 82, Magnetic Mesh Curtain with Heavy Duty Fits Door Size up to 34"x82" Max-White
feature_bullets: MAGNETIC SCREEN DOOR SIZE – Screen door size: 36 x 83 inch--Fit door size: 34x82 inch.【HOW TO CHOOSE SUITABLE SIZE: Before purchase, please carefully measure your door size and order that size (ONLY door size, doesn't include door frame part )】

ECONOMICAL CHOICE - Compared to the previous nylon screen doors mesh with magnets, fiberglass material with better durability, through high temperature molding, fireproof, chemical corrosion resistance, good shape. A good replacement for An actual door, much economical choice for you!

PET FRIENDLY SCREEN MESH - Lets your pets freely go in/out/keeps sealed, your lovely pets could push their way in and out of mesh screen whenever they want, and close up right after they go through it，save your time to get up and down to let pets out everytime.

TAKE MINUTES TO ASSEMBLE AND DETACHABLE - Truly Ready to Stick right on and go. Come with an installation manual helps you install like a breeze! Remove easily and you can rolled it up during the off seasons. Screen mesh door with strong magnets go all the way down the entire middle from top to bottom, sturdy adhesive strip with extra push pins to secure.

ECONOMICAL CHOICE - Compared to the previous nylon screen doors mesh with magnets, fiberglass material with better durability, through high temperature molding, fireproof, chemical corrosion resistance, good shape. A good replacement for An actual door, much economical choice for you!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,753 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
